item.title: Mom and Dad Tips
item.description: Tips Number Mom Dad 1 ??? Always bring more water than you need 2 Cutting onions can make you cry ??? 3 ??? A book read and applied is better than ten books simply read and one hundred books neither read nor applied. 4 Make your bed! Responsibility starts at home Some things are worth your time; some aren’t
